tool_description:
MultiVersus API.
This collection consists of all available fighers in the game, with additional information. 
At the moment it contains a characters namespace, which consists of a fighters collection.
name: MultiVersus
title: MultiVersus

api_list.name: One Fighter
api_list.description: GETs one specific Fighter based upon documentId.

api_list.name: Fighters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://multiversus.p.rapidapi.com/fighters"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "multiversus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://multiversus.p.rapidapi.com/fighters"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "multiversus.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
